text: Sarvajna PU College is a pre-university college in Bangalore, Karnataka, India.Retrieved from Google Maps https://www.google.co.in/maps/place/Deeksha,+Vijayanagar,+Bengaluru/@12.9762295,77.5388407,18.88z/data=!4m8!1m2!2m1!1sSarvajna+PU+College!3m4!1s0x3bae3de804665ca3:0x830e76c26870f1e4!8m2!3d12.9763365!4d77.5394488 It is affiliated to Karnataka Pre-University Education Board.Retrieved from [Department of Pre University Education, Karnataka] http://pue.kar.nic.in/PUE/PDF_files/colleges/AS.pdf It is located at MC Layout, Vijaya Nagar.Retrieved from [The Hindu] http://www.thehindu.com/todays-paper/tp-national/tp-karnataka/5479-pass- percentage-in-pu-exam-in-gulbarga-district/article4694340.ece ==Streams offered== The College offers courses in the below mentioned science streams 1\. PCMB - Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, Biology 2\. PCMC - Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, Computer Science 3\. CEBA - Computer Science, Economics, Business Studies, Accountancy 4\. BEBA - Basic Mathematics, Economics, Business Studies, Accountancy ==Facilities== 1\. Laboratories 2\. Library 3\. Well- equipped classrooms 4\. Playground 5\. Transportation available 6\. Canteen ==References== Category:Pre University colleges in Karnataka
title: Sarvajna PU College
